comments.name: Vasya
comments.comment: I love to write very long headings, titles in letters and messages and I really do not know how to deal with it. That is crushes my life on small pieces. I just can not normally work, sleep and do my everyday businesses. If someone could give me any advice or suggest help of specialist or organization, I would thank that person till the end of my life.
